about_the_game: The official soundtrack of The Valiant includes 16 tracks with 46 minutes of atmospheric music plus an exclusive bonus track. Enjoy the music of The Valiant now on your favorite music player.
detailed_description: The official soundtrack of The Valiant includes 16 tracks with 46 minutes of atmospheric music plus an exclusive bonus track. Enjoy the music of The Valiant now on your favorite music player.

name: The Valiant Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 115 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 508 MB available space
